title: [COMPLETE] Need quick cash?? WTB T206 HOF SGC
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: [COMPLETE] Need quick cash?? WTB T206 HOF SGC
posts.post_content:
[COMPLETE, ended up with two T206 SGC-60 Walter Johnson's, both Pitching, one each Sweet Caporal & Sovereign, $2,880 total]  

My Budget is up to $1,000 (was $2,500, made a purchase)

I am looking for a Great Value in a SGC graded HOFer T206.

Do you need quick cash for that special card auction ending soon?

Do you have a duplicate that would be better served freeing up some much needed cash now?

Would you rather have PSA, and want to move that "extra" SGC holder?

Maybe you have a card that you got at a great deal yourself, and can move it now for timely cash.

Whatever the issue, I can pay immediately.

Your ask price to include Prioritiy Shipping and you will accept regular PayPal for payment.

Please send candidates (Front/Rear Scans & ask $$) to my email.

I may not rush to choose, hoping to get a selection to pick from, unless it is a deal I cannot refuse ! ! !  :)

[url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you ... Steve
